title: RAINBOW SIX: EXTRACTION Deluxe Edition
description: For decades, Team Rainbow has been the shield against the worst global threats imaginable. Now, we face the greatest terror yet: a lethal, mutating alien parasite. • Includes the game, 3 Epic gearsets, and XP boosters to amp up your game as you play alone or with friends from any platform in this 1- to 3-player co-op FPS. • Plus Buddy Pass: Invite 2 friends to play with you for FREE for 14 days. • 69 guns, 25 gadgets, 18 operators with progression levels, 12 large dynamic maps, 13 mutating enemies, and free post-launch. • Test your skills with 4 adjustable difficulty levels and a thrilling Endgame ranked mode. • Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege Players: Get 4 EXCLUSIVE Epic gearsets across both games and unlock all 18 Tom Clancy's Rainbow® Six Extraction operators in Rainbow Six Siege. • *Offer and dates subject to change. Restrictions apply, including availability, technical and content restrictions. Buddy Pass features may differ. Void where prohibited. More info here : https://ubi.li/BuddyPass
